page.title: 08ARNPRIOR POST OFFICE
page.content: The general store/sub post office is owned by the laird of Garden, and rented by a couple. Hours of business are, week days 0700-1800, Saturdays 0700-1300 and Sundays 0900-1700. Post is collected at 1530 on a week day and at 1130 on Saturdays. The postal services offered are mail collection,pensions, child benefit, postal orders and stamps. 60 pensioners are served each week and 20 families get child benefit. General merchandise stocked includes newspapers, bread & fresh bakeries, biscuits, tinned foods, tea, coffee, sugar, milk, detergents, fresh fruit and vegetables, frozen food, cheese, butter, confectionaries and tobacco products. 90 newspapers are sold per day.
